en: [Notice of Sale] 1850 Sep. 5 / James D. Foresee

This document is a notice of the sale of a horse and a yoke of oxen, offered by James D. Foresee, sheriff of Humphreys County, and dated September 5, 1850. The items were apparently the property of Jacob M. Wheat but were taken into possession by the Circuit Court of Humphreys County.

This document is a notice of the sale of a horse and a yoke of oxen, offered by James D. Foresee, sheriff of Humphreys County, and dated September 5, 1850. The items were apparently the property of Jacob M. Wheat but were taken into possession by the Circuit Court of Humphreys County.

none: [Notice of Sale] 1850 Sep. 5 / James D. Foresee : page 1

body.value: Notice I will offer for sale to the highest bidder for Cash in the Town of Waverly on Monday the 7th day of October next, one brown horse and one yoke of Oxens, levid levied on as the property of Jacob. M. Wheat , at the instant of Richard Batson former clerk and Master of the Circuit Court of Humphreys County , To satisfy a Fi Fa to me directed from the honerable honorable Circuit Court of said County, at its July term 1850, Sale within the house prescribed by law &C, et cetera September 5th 1850 . James D. Foresee Shff Sheriff of Humphreys County
